name: Immortal Cultivation Heroes (Chapters of Zhu Xian, Xian Ni, and Ze Tian)
description: Add a Tower hero named Lu Xueqi, a Stronghold hero named Zhang Xiaofan, an Inferno hero named Bi Yao, a Rampart hero named Li Muwan, a Dungeon hero named Wang Lin, a Fortress hero named Ye Fan, and a Conflux hero named Ji Ziyue.
author: L

1.0.0: Add a Tower hero named Lu Xueqi, a Stronghold hero named Zhang Xiaofan, a Hell hero named Bi Yao, a Rampart hero named Li Muwan, a Dungeon hero named Wang Lin, a Fortress hero named Ye Fan, and an Elemental City hero named Ji Ziyue.

chinese.name: 修仙英雄（诛仙仙逆遮天篇）
chinese.description: 添加一个塔楼英雄陆雪琪，一个据点英雄张小凡，，一个地狱英雄碧瑶，一个壁垒英雄李慕婉，一个地下城英雄王林，一个要塞英雄叶凡，一个元素城英雄姬紫月。
